definitions.example: I'm going on a midnight prowl.

definitions.definition: To rove over, through, or about in a stealthy manner; especially, to search in, as for prey or booty.
definitions.example: It's tough to sneak vandalism into Wikipedia as there are plenty of other users prowling the Recent Changes page.

definitions.definition: To idle; to go about aimlessly.
definitions.example: That dandy has nothing better to do than prowl around town all day in his pinstripe suit.
